definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: white stuff (dub. whether cotton or linen, cf. [[כַּרְפַּס]]), ‖[[תְּכֵלֶת]]:—of Mordecai's garments [[בִּלְבוּשׁ מַלְכוּת תְּכֵלֶת וָחוּר]] Es 8:15 in a royal garment of violet and white stuff (cf. [[וְתַכְרִיךְ בּוּץ וְאַרְגׇּמָן]] v:b); of furnishings of royal palace of Susa [[כַּרְפַּס וּתְכֵלֶת אֶחוּז בְּחַבְלֵי־בוּץ]] ´[[ח]] [[וְאַרְגׇּמָן]] Es 1:6 white stuff of fine linen (?) held fast by cords of byssus and purple.
